catalog_info.title: Sensory Ethnography II: Studio Course
catalog_info.notes: Interview with instructor and teaching assistant required for admission.
catalog_info.description: Second half of a year-long sequence (including 1836aar, spring 2013) in which students apply media anthropological theory and conduct ethnography using film, video, sound, still photography, and/or hypermedia. Emphasis is on pre-production and production in the spring, and on post-production in the fall.
